actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.
Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 95-759.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution amending the Rules of the House of Representatives to provide for television and radio coverage of the proceedings of the House.

summary.text: Directs the Speaker of the House of Representatives to devise and implement a closed circuit system for the viewing of House proceedings. Directs the House Committee on Rules to conduct a study of alternative methods of providing audio and visual broadcasting of all such proceedings. Requires the Speaker to implement a broadcasting and recording system for House proceedings. Prohibits such coverage from being used for political purposes, or being broadcast with commercial sponsorship.

titles.title: A resolution amending the Rules of the House of Representatives to provide for television and radio coverage of the proceedings of the House.
